subject: fix(query): add scrollable max-height to expanded builder on mobile
body:
Without a height cap, adding multiple pipeline steps causes the builder
to grow unbounded inside the flex-shrink:0 toolbar. The bottom controls
(Add step, last filter rows) become unreachable since the parent .app
has overflow:hidden. Caps .qb-body at 50vh with overflow-y:auto so
users can scroll within the builder while keeping the graph visible.
